songs.full_title: Something Better by Audien (Ft. Lady A)
songs.title: Something Better

description.plain:
“Something Better” is a dance track by American DJ and electronic music producer Audien from his debut EP, Daydreams. The song features vocals by American country music trio Lady Antebellum, and marks the first collaboration between the two.

Lyrically, the song is about two strangers who hope to find “the one”.

songs.embed_content: Read “Something Better” by Audien on Genius

songs.lyrics:
10 ContributorsSomething Better Lyrics[Verse 1: Charles Kelley]
I never met you, but I know you're out there
If I cross the oceans, would you be there?

[Pre-Chorus: Hillary Scott]
A stranger's eyes that somehow look familiar
I know that when it's you, I'll remember
Remember

[Chorus: Both]
So wait for me; I swear I'll find you
Climbing every wall that hides you
I know we were meant for something better
So wait for me; the world is changing
Underneath, the ground is shaking
You and I were meant for something better
Better, oh
[Post-Chorus: Hillary Scott]
I swear I'll find you

[Verse 2: Charles Kelley & (Hillary Scott)]
I feel the wind move; we breathe the same air
(You're like the best news that I can't share)

[Pre-Chorus: Hillary Scott]
A stranger's eyes that somehow look familiar (Somehow look familiar)
I know that when it's you, I'll remember
Remember

[Chorus: Both]
So wait for me; I swear I'll find you
Climbing every wall that hides you
I know we were meant for something better
So wait for me; the world is changing
Underneath, the ground is shaking
You and I were meant for something better
Better, oh
Oh
So wait for me; the world is changing
Underneath, the ground is shaking
You and I were meant for something better
Better, oh
You might also like[Outro: Hillary Scott]

Oh

songs.full_title: Crazy Love by Audien (Ft. Deb's Daughter)
songs.title: Crazy Love

description.plain:
“Crazy Love” describes a tumultuous relationship that somehow works. It features an appropriately sunny beat from DJ and producer Audien.

Born Nathaniel Rathbun in Mystic, Connecticut, Audien wrote “Crazy Love” with two other people. One was Peter Hanna, who also co-penned Audien’s 2015 chart-topping dance hit “Something Better.” The other writer was Deb’s Daughter, who sings lead on the track.

Audien discussed the song with Dancing Astronaut:

The song is about that kind of relationship, that we’ve all been in, that is equal parts passion and anger, and is entirely unpredictable.

songs.embed_content: Read “Crazy Love” by Audien on Genius

songs.full_title: Leaving You by Audien (Ft. Michael SanFilippo)
songs.title: Leaving You

description.plain: “Leaving You” was released in 2013 on Zouk Recordings. It was the immediate follow-up single to Audien’s smash hit “Wayfarer”, cementing his status as a big name in electronic dance music. The song is categorized as Progressive House music, but like much of Audien’s work, it has trance elements. “Leaving You” is poppy and upbeat, telling the story of a man who has finally resolved to walk away from an abusive relationship which he has returned to again and again. The same verse is repeated twice throughout the song, which is unusual for dance music, as the second verse is usually different from the first.

songs.embed_content: Read “Leaving You” by Audien on Genius
